overview: Julio Hernandez-Miyares is a technology executive experienced in delivering large scale, reliable products while establishing globally dispersed development centers. From 2007-2010 he was CTO of AOL Entertainment and Games, where he headed a global development organization composed of architects, software and QA engineers, and technical program and Project Managers for three of AOL Media’s business units. He held responsibility for technical architecture and technology development and testing for such high profile AOL Properties as MovieFone, AOL Music, Winamp, AOL Television, AOL Video Portal, Games, Black Voices, Slashcontrol.com, and Asylum Network.
